R users can employ a nice slider (or embedded slideshow/gallery) like `loryR` in many ways.  Let's look at two different uses to help us explore how to work with `loryR`.

### Use 1 | RStudio Gallery

As we bang away in RStudio, we can start to collect quite a few plots in our RStudio plots tab.  While we can explore our history with the forward/back buttons, I often want to quickly view or share some or all of these plots.
